channel.title: CVE Feed for rankmath -- Rank Math SEO with AI SEO Tools
channel.description: The latest CVEs for rankmath -- Rank Math SEO with AI SEO Tools

item.title: CVE-2024-2536|2024-06-04T17:29:59.781Z -- rankmath -- rank%20math%20seo%20with%20ai%20seo%20tools
item.description: The Rank Math SEO with AI SEO Tools plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the HowTo block attributes in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.214 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
